mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LOAISACH ( genre_name, date_add ) VALUES ( #{genre_name}, now() )
mapper.update: update LOAISACH set genre_name = IF(#{genre_name} IS NOT NULL, #{genre_name}, genre_name) where genre_id = #{genre_id}
mapper.select: select * from LOAISACH WHERE genre_name like concat('%', #{name}, '%') order by date_add desc limit 10 offset #{ignore};
